title: Extensions & Extra-Genetic Culture
purpose: Anchor the idea that media extend human faculties and transmit culture beyond biology.

title: Technology, Being & Cosmotechnics
purpose: Interrogate the essence(s) of technology across cultures.

title: Media Ecology, Bias & Infrastructure
purpose: Media as environments; infrastructural bias in time/space.

title: Augmentation Lineage: Memex → NLS → Hypermedia
purpose: Trace a pragmatic arc of tools that amplify thinking.

title: Culture & Interpretation (Thick Description)
purpose: Practice reading culture as text and system.

title: Images, Apparatus & the Aura
purpose: From mechanical reproduction to algorithmic images.

title: AI, Identity & Method
purpose: Ethics of large models and cultural self-fashioning.

title: Memes, Myths & Replication
purpose: Cultural replication logics from memes to myths.
